PluginLackDep: {{name}} plugin needs module {{node_modules}} in order to load the plugin
pluginExist: '{{name}}' plugin already exist, avoided the plugin to load again
ambiguousPlugin: Ambiguous plugin name '{{name}}' for files {{files}} in 'plugins'
contentMustBeObject: The content of the file generated by the plugin must be an Object format

API.notCompatible: {{pluginName}} plugin is not compatible, supported API version: {{supported_api_ver}} (Required API version: {{required_api_ver}})

loadingFailed: An error has occurred when loading the plugin {{plugin_name}}@{{plugin_version}}:
disableFailed: An error occured when disabling '{{name}}' plugin
